name: A bloodstained surplice
data: It increases the users strength a bit.
It decreases the users dexterity a tiny bit.
It increases the users constitution a bit.
It increases the users wisdom adequately.
It has average armour class for its type (low in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration strongly.
It increases the users physical resistance somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers somewhat slower than avarage.
It gives decent bonus to the spell 'mark of zomm'.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'holy might'.
